FuncDef: Use this command to define the source IP address that the session controller (launch point) will use for the test. The source address must be a local resident IP address in the context; otherwise, the response packets will not be processed by the TWAMP Light application. Only source addresses configured as part of TWAMP tests will be able to process the reflected TWAMP packets from the session reflector.

ParaDef.Info: Keyword that indicates the launch point.

This mandatory parameter is required in order to validate the TWAMP Light response received from the reflector. The initial source must be the destination in the response. Values-IPv4 address in the form a.b.c.d.
